text: welcome to pregnancy and postpartum tv a

be able to have the quick

berries or you could add one of the

something like stevia or monk fruit
which are made from plants so stevia is
a green leafy plant i used to grow it in
my garden dehydrate it and that sweetens
food but you can also buy
the drops from the store or monk fruit
is a berry that comes from china and it
also doesn't increase blood sugar

leftovers is also a great breakfast so
if you have something like chicken or

warming it up again i hope that gave you
some breakfast ideas
we do tend to struggle with blood sugars
earlier in the morning as we sleep we
produce hormones
and these hormones cause insulin
resistance so our insulin isn't able to
move our sugar from
our blood stream into our cells as
easily in the morning hours
so some women do find it more helpful to
help control their sugars
by having a lower carb amount at
breakfast so if you're looking for more
ideas you can always
search search up keto breakfast ideas
and then
add in the amount of carb that you
decided with your dietitian or your
doctor with
some women can handle up to 45 grams of
carbohydrate at breakfast but this isn't
necessary
and i find a lot of women do better if
they're having around 20 grams of
carbohydrate for their breakfast
